author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Lady Gaga Gave Us Life With Her Dazzling Super Bowl Halftime Show - See All the Pictures
text:
Lady Gaga Super Bowl Halftime Show Pictures 2017 Lady Gaga Gave Us Life With Her Dazzling Super Bowl Halftime Show — See All the Pictures February 5, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Lady Gaga Gave Us Life With Her Dazzling Super Bowl Halftime Show — See All the Pictures 
Hold on to your seats, little monsters. On Sunday night, Lady Gaga performed the Super Bowl 51 halftime show in Houston, and we haven't been the same since. The singer was on top of the world (or at least the arena) as she kicked off her big performance. Aside from suspending herself above the stage, she blew everyone away with a collection of her greatest hits, including "Bad Romance" and "Million Reasons." Relive every iconic moment ahead.
